summary: Curcy Hendricks Andrews, Jr., known as Bud Andrews  was an American deejay.
full_text: Curcy Hendricks Andrews, Jr., known as Bud Andrews  was an American deejay at Radio KDAV in Lubbock, Texas, who in 1970 is said to have "discovered" the Mississippi-based humorist Jerry Clower.
title: Bud Andrews
